sentences: Delegates continued discussions on the 'Bonn Agreements' at COP-7 in Marrakesh, Morocco, from 29 October to 10 November 2001.

After lengthy negotiations, a package deal on LULUCF, mechanisms, compliance, Protocol Articles 5 (methodological issues), 7 (communication of information) and 8 (review of information), and input to the World Summit on Sustainable Development (WSSD) was proposed.
Following extensive negotiations, delegates agreed, and the 'Marrakesh Accords' were adopted.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
